thread.title_full: Jennifer Aniston Is Hotter Than Fire Flashing Her Glowing Skin At The Oscars!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Jennifer Aniston Is Hotter Than Fire Flashing Her Glowing Skin At The Oscars!
text:
2/26/2017 11:37 PM ET | Filed under: Jennifer Aniston • Fashion Smashion • Oscars • Red Carpet • Versace 
Holy hotness!! 
Jennifer Aniston didn't end up walking the red carpet at the Oscars on Sunday night, but we'll forgive her because she completely slayed as she took the stage! 
The actress showed off her incredible figure in a sizzling, beaded black Atelier Versace gown with a plunging neckline and up-to-there slit. 
So stunning!! 
Jen also styled the look with strappy black sandals and sleek locks to complete the jaw-dropping ensem. 
Fucking fabulous!
